body: # Load pre-shuffled MNIST data into train and test sets
Keras 2.4.0 Load Mnist.description: Loads the dataset of 60,000 28x28 grayscale images of the 10 digits, along with a test set of 10,000 images.

body: # Load pre-shuffled Fashion MNIST data into train and test sets
Keras 2.4.0 Load Fashion Mnist.description: Loads the dataset of 60,000 28x28 grayscale images of 10 fashion categories, along with a test set of 10,000 images

body: # Load pre-shuffled CIFAR10 data into train and test sets
Keras 2.4.0 Loads CIFAR10 dataset.description: Loads the dataset of 50,000 32x32 color training images and 10,000 test images, labeled over 10 categories

body: # Load pre-shuffled CIFAR100 data into train and test sets
Keras 2.4.0 Loads CIFAR100 dataset.description: Loads the dataset of 50,000 32x32 color training images and 10,000 test images, labeled over 100 fine-grained classes that are grouped into 20 coarse-grained classes.

body: # Load pre-shuffled IMBD data into train and test sets
Keras 2.4.0 Loads IMDB Movie Review Sent.description: Loads the dataset of 50,000 32x32 color training images and 10,000 test images, labeled over 100 fine-grained classes that are grouped into 20 coarse-grained classes.

body: # Load pre-shuffled Boston Housing price data into train and test sets
Keras 2.4.0 Loads Boston Housing price r.description: Loads the dataset samples containing 13 attributes of houses at different locations around the Boston suburbs in the late 1970s.
